text.section: If the bylaws provide, a director emeritus may advise and consult with the board and aid the board in carrying out the board's duties and responsibilities.

The bylaws shall provide for:
The number of directors emeriti; and
The qualifications for a director emeritus.

A director emeritus:
Shall be a member of the credit union; and
May not be an officer or an official.

A director emeritus may not:
Participate in any board or committee deliberations;
Make motions; or
Vote on any matter before the board.
